name: Young Hellhound
languages: Understands Infernal and Ignan, but cannot speak

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.desc: The hound has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The hound has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hound’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn’t incapacitated.

traits.name: Pounce
traits.desc: If the hound moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a bite attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 2 (1d4) piercing damage and must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.
